patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,108 +1,13 @@
-menu "ST7789 Configuration"
+// Assuming gamma values
+float gamma_r = 2.2f;
+float gamma_g = 2.2f;
+float gamma_b = 2.2f;
 
-    config GPIO_RANGE_MAX
-        int
-        default 48
+// Inside your image processing loop
+uint8_t r, g, b; // RGB values from the image
 
-    config WIDTH
-        int "SCREEN WIDTH"
-        range 0 999
-        default 240
-        help
-            The width resolution of the screen.
+// Convert and adjust the pixel color
+uint16_t color = rgb565_conv_with_color_tweaks(r, g, b, gamma_r, gamma_g, gamma_b, color_tweaks);
 
-    config HEIGHT
-        int "SCREEN HEIGHT"
-        range 0 999
-        default 240
-        help
-            The height resolution of the screen.
-
-    config OFFSETX
-        int "GRAM X OFFSET"
-        range 0 99
-        default 0
-        help
-            When your TFT has an offset (X), set it.
-
-    config OFFSETY
-        int "GRAM Y OFFSET"
-        range 0 99
-        default 0
-        help
-            When your TFT has an offset (Y), set it.
-
-    config MOSI_GPIO
-        int "MOSI GPIO number"
-        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
-        default 35
-        help
-            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI MOSI.
-            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as MOSI.
-
-    config SCLK_GPIO
-        int "SCLK GPIO number"
-        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
-        default 36
-        help
-            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI SCLK.
-            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as SCLK.
-
-    config CS_GPIO
-        int "CS GPIO number"
-        range -1 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
-        default -1
-        help
-            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI CS.
-            When it is -1, CS isn't performed.
-            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as CS.
-
-    config DC_GPIO
-        int "DC GPIO number"
-        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
-        default 40
-        help
-            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI DC.
-            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as DC.
-
-    config RESET_GPIO
-        int "RESET GPIO number"
-        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
-        default 41
-        help
-            GPIO number (IOxx) to RESET.
-            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as RESET.
-
-    config BL_GPIO
-        int "BACKLIGHT GPIO number"
-        range -1 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
-        default 33
-        help
-            GPIO number (IOxx) to BACKLIGHT.
-            When it is -1, BACKLIGHT isn't performed.
-            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as BACKLIGHT.
-
-    config INVERSION
-        bool "Enable Display Inversion"
-        default false
-        help
-            Enable Display Inversion.
-
-    choice SPI_HOST
-        prompt "SPI peripheral that controls this bus"
-        default SPI2_HOST
-        help
-            Select SPI peripheral that controls this bus.
-
-        config SPI2_HOST
-            bool "SPI2_HOST"
-            help
-                Use SPI2_HOST. This is also called HSPI_HOST.
-
-        config SPI3_HOST
-            bool "SPI3_HOST"
-            help
-                Use SPI3_HOST. This is also called VSPI_HOST.
-    endchoice
-
-endmenu
+// Draw the pixel
+lcdDrawPixel(dev, x, y, color);

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,13 +1,211 @@
-// Assuming gamma values
-float gamma_r = 2.2f;
-float gamma_g = 2.2f;
-float gamma_b = 2.2f;
+menu "ST7796S Configuration"
 
-// Inside your image processing loop
-uint8_t r, g, b; // RGB values from the image
+    config GPIO_RANGE_MAX
+        int
+        default 48
 
-// Convert and adjust the pixel color
-uint16_t color = rgb565_conv_with_color_tweaks(r, g, b, gamma_r, gamma_g, gamma_b, color_tweaks);
+    config WIDTH
+        int "SCREEN WIDTH"
+        range 0 999
+        default 320
+        help
+            The width resolution of the screen.
 
-// Draw the pixel
-lcdDrawPixel(dev, x, y, color);
+    config HEIGHT
+        int "SCREEN HEIGHT"
+        range 0 999
+        default 480
+        help
+            The height resolution of the screen.
+
+    config OFFSETX
+        int "GRAM X OFFSET"
+        range 0 99
+        default 0
+        help
+            When your TFT has an offset (X), set it.
+
+    config OFFSETY
+        int "GRAM Y OFFSET"
+        range 0 99
+        default 0
+        help
+            When your TFT has an offset (Y), set it.
+
+    config MOSI_GPIO
+        int "MOSI GPIO number"
+        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
+        default 23
+        help
+            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI MOSI.
+
+    config SCLK_GPIO
+        int "SCLK GPIO number"
+        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
+        default 18
+        help
+            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI SCLK.
+
+    config CS_GPIO
+        int "CS GPIO number"
+        range -1 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
+        default -1
+        help
+            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI CS.
+            When it is -1, CS isn't performed.
+
+    config DC_GPIO
+        int "DC GPIO number"
+        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
+        default 19
+        help
+            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI DC.
+
+    config RESET_GPIO
+        int "RESET GPIO number"
+        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
+        default 21
+        help
+            GPIO number (IOxx) to RESET.
+
+    config BL_GPIO
+        int "BACKLIGHT GPIO number"
+        range -1 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
+        default 5
+        help
+            GPIO number (IOxx) to BACKLIGHT.
+            When it is -1, BACKLIGHT isn't performed.
+
+    config INVERSION
+        bool "Enable Display Inversion"
+        default false
+        help
+            Enable Display Inversion.
+
+    choice ORIENTATION
+        prompt "Display Orientation"
+        default ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE
+        help
+            Select the orientation of the display.
+
+        config ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE
+            bool "Landscape"
+            help
+                Landscape orientation.
+
+        config ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT
+            bool "Portrait"
+            help
+                Portrait orientation.
+
+        config ORIENTATION_INVERTED_LANDSCAPE
+            bool "Inverted Landscape"
+            help
+                Inverted Landscape orientation.
+
+        config ORIENTATION_INVERTED_PORTRAIT
+            bool "Inverted Portrait"
+            help
+                Inverted Portrait orientation.
+    endchoice
+
+    choice SPI_HOST
+        prompt "SPI peripheral that controls this bus"
+        default SPI2_HOST
+        help
+            Select SPI peripheral that controls this bus.
+
+        config SPI2_HOST
+            bool "SPI2_HOST"
+            help
+                Use SPI2_HOST. This is also called HSPI_HOST.
+
+        config SPI3_HOST
+            bool "SPI3_HOST"
+            help
+                Use SPI3_HOST. This is also called VSPI_HOST.
+    endchoice
+
+    menu "Color Tweaks"
+
+        comment "Shadows (Dark Areas)"
+
+        config SHADOWS_CYAN_RED
+            int "Shadows Cyan-Red Adjustment (%)"
+            range -100 100
+            default 0
+            help
+                Adjusts the Cyan-Red scale for shadows.
+                Negative values increase cyan; positive values increase red.
+
+        config SHADOWS_MAGENTA_GREEN
+            int "Shadows Magenta-Green Adjustment (%)"
+            range -100 100
+            default 0
+            help
+                Adjusts the Magenta-Green scale for shadows.
+                Negative values increase magenta; positive values increase green.
+
+        config SHADOWS_YELLOW_BLUE
+            int "Shadows Yellow-Blue Adjustment (%)"
+            range -100 100
+            default 0
+            help
+                Adjusts the Yellow-Blue scale for shadows.
+                Negative values increase yellow; positive values increase blue.
+
+        comment "Midtones (Medium Brightness Areas)"
+
+        config MIDTONES_CYAN_RED
+            int "Midtones Cyan-Red Adjustment (%)"
+            range -100 100
+            default 0
+            help
+                Adjusts the Cyan-Red scale for midtones.
+                Negative values increase cyan; positive values increase red.
+
+        config MIDTONES_MAGENTA_GREEN
+            int "Midtones Magenta-Green Adjustment (%)"
+            range -100 100
+            default 0
+            help
+                Adjusts the Magenta-Green scale for midtones.
+                Negative values increase magenta; positive values increase green.
+
+        config MIDTONES_YELLOW_BLUE
+            int "Midtones Yellow-Blue Adjustment (%)"
+            range -100 100
+            default -20
+            help
+                Adjusts the Yellow-Blue scale for midtones.
+                Negative values increase yellow; positive values increase blue.
+
+        comment "Highlights (Bright Areas)"
+
+        config HIGHLIGHTS_CYAN_RED
+            int "Highlights Cyan-Red Adjustment (%)"
+            range -100 100
+            default 0
+            help
+                Adjusts the Cyan-Red scale for highlights.
+                Negative values increase cyan; positive values increase red.
+
+        config HIGHLIGHTS_MAGENTA_GREEN
+            int "Highlights Magenta-Green Adjustment (%)"
+            range -100 100
+            default 0
+            help
+                Adjusts the Magenta-Green scale for highlights.
+                Negative values increase magenta; positive values increase green.
+
+        config HIGHLIGHTS_YELLOW_BLUE
+            int "Highlights Yellow-Blue Adjustment (%)"
+            range -100 100
+            default 0
+            help
+                Adjusts the Yellow-Blue scale for highlights.
+                Negative values increase yellow; positive values increase blue.
+
+    endmenu
+
+endmenu

+    float "Gamma Correction for Green Channel"
+    default 2.2

+    default 2.2
+    help
+        Set the gamma correction value for the blue channel.
+
+
         comment "Shadows (Dark Areas)"
 
         config SHADOWS_CYAN_RED
             int "Shadows Cyan-Red Adjustment (%)"

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
menu "ST7789 Configuration"

    config GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        int
        default 48

    config WIDTH
        int "SCREEN WIDTH"
        range 0 999
        default 240
        help
            The width resolution of the screen.

    config HEIGHT
        int "SCREEN HEIGHT"
        range 0 999
        default 240
        help
            The height resolution of the screen.

    config OFFSETX
        int "GRAM X OFFSET"
        range 0 99
        default 0
        help
            When your TFT has an offset (X), set it.

    config OFFSETY
        int "GRAM Y OFFSET"
        range 0 99
        default 0
        help
            When your TFT has an offset (Y), set it.

    config MOSI_GPIO
        int "MOSI GPIO number"
        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 35
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI MOSI.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as MOSI.

    config SCLK_GPIO
        int "SCLK GPIO number"
        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 36
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI SCLK.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as SCLK.

    config CS_GPIO
        int "CS GPIO number"
        range -1 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default -1
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI CS.
            When it is -1, CS isn't performed.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as CS.

    config DC_GPIO
        int "DC GPIO number"
        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 40
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to SPI DC.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as DC.

    config RESET_GPIO
        int "RESET GPIO number"
        range 0 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 41
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to RESET.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as RESET.

    config BL_GPIO
        int "BACKLIGHT GPIO number"
        range -1 GPIO_RANGE_MAX
        default 33
        help
            GPIO number (IOxx) to BACKLIGHT.
            When it is -1, BACKLIGHT isn't performed.
            Some GPIOs are used for other purposes (flash connections, etc.) and cannot be used as BACKLIGHT.

    config INVERSION
        bool "Enable Display Inversion"
        default false
        help
            Enable Display Inversion.

    choice SPI_HOST
        prompt "SPI peripheral that controls this bus"
        default SPI2_HOST
        help
            Select SPI peripheral that controls this bus.

        config SPI2_HOST
            bool "SPI2_HOST"
            help
                Use SPI2_HOST. This is also called HSPI_HOST.

        config SPI3_HOST
            bool "SPI3_HOST"
            help
                Use SPI3_HOST. This is also called VSPI_HOST.
    endchoice

endmenu
